bug.author: Leprechault
bug.summary: mAP output in *txt file not created
bug.description: I try to get the mAP results in a *txt file using ./darknet detector map obj.data obj.cfg backup/obj_100.weights -map | tee result_mAP.txt, but doesn't work (no output *txt file created). Any ideas about the absence of this file?

comments.comment: Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Leprechault>@Leprechault</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1G8T-VFxQkjDe4idzN8F-hbIBqkkkQnxw>Google Colab Notebook</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>GCP Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you.
